name: Self-Learning Portal
description: Level up your self-studying with this template! The Self-Learning Portal is a Notion template inspired by my learning management system. It helps you organize your learning journeys with self-constructed educational curriculums, modules, and assignments. As an autodidact, I find structure critical to stay disciplined about my learning, and this system has been instrumental in helping me advance my skills in artificial intelligence, mathematics, and computer science.
